text: Ish-Shalom (, "Man of Peace") may refer to: * Meir Ish-Shalom (Friedman) (1831 - 1908), Hungarian rabbi * Mordechai Ish-Shalom (1902 - 1991), an Israeli politician * Benjamin Ish-Shalom (born 1953), an Israeli professor of Jewish Studies == See also == * Judaism and peace Category:Hebrew-language surnames
title: Ish-Shalom
